5E05B850DE5040A1B702EC843EC4628E.description: Disseminate/convey to the public data and news about the school in foreign languages.

B516295FB5544A5EB12116BA3300307A.description: Use foreign languages in conducting research, collecting and summarising knowledge/various data from the media and different learning sources for further education and livelihood.

5A2C78771DF344B4B8608E71FAC8104F.description: Usage of foreign languages as basic tools for further education, livelihood and exchange of learning with the world community.

E6BBF25C517442F793A9B66942939A01.description: Use language for communication in real situations/ simulated situations in the classroom, school and community.

51B990C221444131B03E5D4C3CB97BFF.description: Ability to use foreign languages in various situations in school, community and society.

D498333E9E7640519E1DC567DABCD2B9.description: Search for, collect and summarise the data/facts related to other learning areas from learning sources, and present them through speaking/writing.

4DE02BB5153C4F68975EF008CFF42ECF.description: Usage of foreign languages to link knowledge with other learning areas, as foundation for further development and to seek knowledge and widen one's world view.

940E0EF62EE84177A7FA64C8D53E1788.description: Compare and explain similarities and difference between the lifestyles and culture of native speakers and those of Thais.

C94D0CA98F39471C917075CEE18CAB8D.description: Compare and explain similarities and differences between pronunciation of various kinds of sentences and word order in accordance with structures of sentences in foreign languages and Thai language.

504089D3E44440E6AE72B6F27254319C.description: Appreciation of similarities and differences between language and culture of native and Thai speakers, and capacity for accurate and appropriate use of language.

E43B5713BC364E1CA264307F55662CB4.description: Participate in language and cultural activities in accordance with their interests.

E8BD2A5F57E142108F726222159564DD.description: Describe the festivals, important days, lifestyles and traditions of native speakers.

34264100F5CC4316AD5DEC0B99A6F852.description: Use language, tone of voice, gestures and manners appropriate to various persons and occasions by observing social manners of native speakers.

0D3A7F05BD9A475EBFA9D446E5CEBE71.description: Appreciation of the relationship between language and culture of native speakers and capacity for use of language appropriate to occasions and places.

D6B815A39686494093E765F6E9C973E6.description: Speak and write to express opinions about activities or various matters around them and experiences, as well as provide brief justifications.

796A58CEEA5346CAADF16947F0E61709.description: Speak and write to summarise the main idea, theme and topic identified from analysis of matters/news/incidents of interest to society.

01079766E50E460E9C8E1295042368A3.description: Speak and write to describe themselves, their daily routines, experiences and news/incidents of interest to society.

F0417A6E6A764C7EA30D10E23675D5D0.description: Ability to present data, information, concepts and views about various matters through speaking and writing.

965396FE1B9A4D9980ED6F3A2AFC1111.description: Speak and write to express their own feelings and opinions about various matters around them, various activities, as well as provide brief justifications appropriately.

752249F66C5347799323C9F56843013A.description: Speak and write appropriately to ask for and give data, describe and express opinions about what has been heard or read.

80D96CB06E0E408C9CE552ED53B16B6C.description: Speak and write appropriately to express needs, offer help and agree and refuse to give help in various situations.

4F74EC4E00D54DADA864C0387737B459.description: Use orders and give instructions, clarifications and explanations according to the situation.

A815F8463A5F464E87427F802E1B281B.description: Converse appropriately to exchange data about themselves, various matters around them and various situations in daily life.

53F216C6109C4398BFE6DFB604885BA5.description: Endowment with language communication skills for exchange of data and information; efficient expression of feelings and opinions.

E310877D30CD43A592C80CAF139203F6.description: Choose the topic and main idea, tell supporting details and express opinions about what has been heard and read, as well as provide justifications and simple examples for illustration.

F77670C984C0462DB5AD3BDA8E1A338B.description: Specify/write sentences and texts related to various forms of non-text information read.

5CC84CD6CF1F471AA7C70D9E478E5C44.description: Accurately read aloud texts, news, advertisements and short poems by observing the principles of reading.

22BF4E019E634D6D807C2E8B77575019.description: Act in compliance with requests, instructions, clarifications and simple explanations heard and read.

2E09AB32B46444D3B7DC5E811DA0D432.description: Understanding of and capacity to interpret what has been heard and read from various types of media, and ability to express opinions with proper reasoning.
